-- Pulse Program
-- R1 has the move condiguration
-- R6 has the configuration of GPIO Direction Register


Address		MachineCode		Mnemonic		Comment
0x00000000				ADDI R2, R0, 0x001	(R2=0x00000001 : To invert the pulse bit)
0x00000004				LW R3, R0, 0x01C	(R3=0xC0004004 : GPIO Output Register Address)
0x00000008				ADDI R4, R0, 0x024	(R4=0x00000024 : Starting Address of Pulse Program)
0x0000000C				LW R5, R0, 0x020	(R5=#start_addr : Starting Address of Main Program)
0x00000010				ADDI R6, R0, 0x0FF	(Content to configure the GPIO Direction Register)
0x00000014				SW R6, 0x004(R3)	(Configuring the GPIO Direction Register)
0x00000018				JALR R0, R5, 0x004	(Jump to tha Main Program)
0x0000001C	C0004004		Not an instruction	GPIO Output Register Address
0x00000020	0000004C		Not an instruction	Start Address of Main Program

-- Pulse Program Begins

0x00000024				ADDI R7, R0, 0x065	(R7=0x00000065 : Initializing counter)
0x00000028				SW R1, 0x000(R3)	(Sending data to GPIO Output Register)
0x0000002C				XOR R1, R1, R2		(Flip the pulse bit)
0x00000030				ADDI R7, R7, 0xFFF	(R7=R7-1)
0x00000034				ADDI R8, R0, 0x7FF	(R8=0x000007FF)
0x00000038				SLLI R8, R8, 0x003	(R8=R8<<3)
0x0000003C				ADDI R8, R8, 0XFFF	(R8=R8-1)
0x00000040				BNE R0,R8, 0XFFC	(Slow down loop)
0x00000044				BNE R0, R7, 0xFE4	(If R7!=0 Loop the pulse)
0x00000048				JALR R0, R5, 0x004	(Return and resume the main program)

-- Main Program Begins

0x0000004C				Not an Instruction




00100113
01C02183
02400213
02002283
0FF00313
00618223
00428067
